items.name: 10kg Heart
items.desc:
Mango Coconut Imperial Ice Cream Sour 8% 440ml CAN
Not suitable for vegans
This beer might just bring new meaning to the words thick and juicy, it’s probably the wackiest beer we’ve ever made and certainly the fruitiest.
Brewed in collaboration with Mikkeller Brew Pub, we really pushed the limits of how much fruit could go in a beer and the result is insanely super thick and luscious. Is this beer everything that's wrong with modern brewing, or everything that's oooh so right?
We have a very limited amount of this beer- cans will only be available here online and at our taproom & The Experiment.

Big & milky.
Smooth & silky.
Creamy, dreamy good guy.

items.name: Cast Iron Billy
items.desc:
10.5% Imperial Brown Stout 440ml CAN
Cast Iron Billy is a luxurious Imperial Brown Stout that harkens back to Victorian London’s brewing golden age. We’re extremely proud of our city’s rich brewing history and so for this beer we’ve drawn on an original Barclay Perkins recipe from 1832.
Velvety smooth with chocolate, caramel and dark berry flavours alongside delicate hints of vanilla- you’d be forgiven for thinking Cast Iron Billy sits well below its 10.5% ABV.
Close your eyes, take a sip and imagine walking down the smog filled streets of industrial revolution era Southwark...
...or maybe just enjoy your beer.

items.name: Even Robots Dream
items.desc:
8.5% Sabro & Citra New England DIPA 440ml Can
Pass me the pina colada!
Plug in Citra & Sabro then see what comes out the other side.
Hazy, soft & juicy, a fruit machine fantasy.

items.name: In Dreams
items.desc:
Idaho 7 & Mosaic New England Pale 5.8% 440ml CAN
Our Dream pales are all about embracing your soft and romantic side. Play your favourite love songs, look at some flowers, read a poem and bask in the gentle fruity Idaho-7 & Mosaic hop aromas of In Dreams.
We try and keep the ABV of these New England pales below 6%, to keep things breezy and light. With oat in the mash for that creamy body-ody-ody, and London Ale yeast working its hazy magic, In Dreams carries you along in a soft juicy cloud.
Label artwork is by our In-House Dream Co-ordinator Sienna, featuring the world famous Tottenham Hale cherry blossoms in the spring sunshine.
Sprinkle stardust & dream.

items.name: Least Resistance
items.desc:

Fresh as a daisy, light as a feather, cool as a cucumber & easy like Sunday morning. A fresh and full bodied beer loaded with citrusy hops and a touch of lemon & lime zest for a zingy, zippy good time.
Shipping is £3.99 per box
Each box can hold up to 15 beers
Minimum order is 8 cans (can be made up of different beers)

items.name: Lucky
items.desc:
6.8% Simcoe NEIPA 440ml Can
Who said NEIPAs had to be juice, juice, and nothing but the juice?
With an aroma full of peach, and a piney resinous aftertone, Lucky shows you the full range of what Simcoe can do. A New England cousin to Alligator Tugboat, our Simcoe-celebrating West Coast IPA, Lucky has the full-bodied softness you would expect of a NEIPA, with a piney twist and bitter finish that leaves you wanting more.
The label artwork is designed by Graham O'Brien, one of Pressure Drop’s three founders/owners and is inspired by pop art and watching vintage episodes of Batman on a Saturday morning. POW!
As the poet and philosopher, Britney Jean Spears, once said, “she’s so Lucky, she’s a star”

items.name: Pale Fire
items.desc:
4.8% Amarillo & Mosaic Pale Ale 440ml Can
Pale Fire.
We’ve come a long long way together.
If there is one beer that we think of when our minds drift to what Pressure Drop means, it is Pale Fire. Brewed every week since our earliest days, it is our shining, hazy gold, North Star of a beer.
Pale Fire is the definition of the Pressure Drop mantra - “We brew what we would like to drink”. Sessionable, with tropical aromas from the Mosaic and Amarillo hops, it is a juicy pale with a balanced bitter finish.
When we first began experimenting with canning here at Pressure Drop, the end goal was always going to be Pale Fire in cans. Spending time with pals, opening a six pack of fresh and crisp Pale Fire, enjoying its easy drinking ways. That has been the dream, now it is the reality.
Find your nearest sun drenched swimming pool, hike in the gentle shade of a pine forest, or, failing that, sit in the hazy summer heat of a city park. Crack open a can, and let the world become a better place.
SHIPPING £3.99 per box
Boxes hold up to 15 cans
Our minimum order is 12 cans (these can be a mix of different beers)

items.name: Show Me Something New
items.desc:
American Brown Ale 5.6% 440ml CAN
Not everything has to be hoppy and hazy, right?
Made with a blend of six kilned malts to give a layered toasty biscuit flavour. To balance the rich malt character, this beer is then hopped with a fair amount of Mosaic in the whirlpool and a gentle Simcoe dry hop for a touch of pine bitterness.
Easy drinking yet full of flavour.
Go on, show me something new!
SHIPPING £3.99 per box
Boxes hold up to 15 cans
Our minimum order is 8 cans (these can be a mix of different beers)

items.name: Understanding Whole Systems NEIPA
items.desc:
7.4% Citra DDH NEIPA 440ml Can
Methodically blow your mind.
Understanding Whole Systems is an IPA of substance and curiosity, an exploration of taste through the prism of Citra hops and a complete presentation London Fog yeast. Soft and hazy, complex and full.
We enjoy drinking whilst reading entries from Pressure Drop’s own catalog, printed on the label.
Stay Hungry. Stay Foolish.
